document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Date: Wed, 14 Oct 2020 16:27:04 +0000 
Thanks very much. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 202012:22 PM 
To 
Subject: RE: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
It is possible I sent you the wrong link. I am currently in the White Plains office sending out a hard drive for the 
production. I will check the link when I get back to my computer and have my RSA token. 
Thank you. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2020 10:48 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Thanks When I click on the link you sent, it brings me to the "FBI Files from Florida Office" folder, but it appears to 
bring up all 26,164 documents in that folder, when the production should be a smaller number of documents bearing the 
tags I listed below. Are you free for a call to discuss? 
From 
Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2020 10:02 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Good Morning 
Thank you for the e-mail. Just to confirm can you please review the below search and let me know that everything that is 
in the search is everything you wish to produce for item three. I want to make sure that we have everything you need 
before we start the imaging process. 
EFTA00022047

Thank you. 
Fro 
Sent: Tuesday, October 13, 2020 11:17 PM 
To: 
Subject: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Thanks very much for speaking earlier today. As discussed, we are asking for the following three productions to be 
prepared for the Maxwell case. I've listed those tasks below in the order in which we discussed them, but, as we 
discussed, if you and the vendor believe a different order would be more efficient, please just let me know. 
EFTA00022048

As we've discussed, we need all of these materials to be delivered to 1St. Andrews by the end of October in order to 
meet our discovery deadline. 
Finally, I believe should be sending you a drive containing the scans of boxes of files from the USAO-SDFL. 
We need all of those files loaded into the US v Epstein database on Relativity in a new folder entitled "USAO-SDFL Files," 
ASAP so that we can review them, please. 
Thanks very much, as always for your help, and please do not hesitate to reach out if there are any questions or 
confusion. I'm always happy to chat. 
Thanks so much, 
EFTA00022049
